title: AI-Powered Course Creation Software
description:
We are building an innovative AI-powered SaaS platform that simplifies and accelerates the process of online course creation. This tool will leverage OpenAIâ€™s GPT models to help creators go from idea to structured, monetizable courses in minutes.




We are seeking a full-stack developer with strong backend experience and a good understanding of integrating OpenAIâ€™s GPT API, user interfaces, and database management.




Key Responsibilities:




Develop a responsive, user-friendly web application for AI-driven course creation

Integrate OpenAI GPT API for content generation features (course titles, modules, descriptions, etc.)

Build secure authentication and user dashboard features

Create dynamic form-based workflows for 7-step course planning

Set up database structures to save and retrieve user sessions and course plans

Develop admin panel for managing users, plans, and analytics

Ensure mobile and desktop responsiveness

Optimize performance, reliability, and security




Required Skills & Experience:




Proven experience with full-stack web development

Frontend: React.js / Next.js / Vue.js (any modern JS framework)

Backend: Node.js / Express / Python Flask / Django

Strong experience with OpenAI API integration

Database: MongoDB / Firebase / PostgreSQL (any modern DB stack)

RESTful API design & integration

Knowledge of user authentication systems (JWT, OAuth)

Familiarity with SaaS product development lifecycles

Excellent problem-solving and communication skills




Nice to Have:




UI/UX design experience or familiarity with tools like Figma

Experience working with Stripe, PayPal or RazorPay for SaaS billing

Background in EdTech or course platforms

Knowledge of Zapier or Make integrations




What Youâ€™ll Get:




Opportunity to work on a visionary AI-based product from the ground up

Flexible remote work with creative freedom

Performance-based bonus and long-term potential

Collaborative environment with fast decision-making




To Apply, please send:




Your portfolio or links to relevant projects

A short proposal on how youâ€™d approach this software

Resume and availability

title: AI Consultant- On-Site In Pune
description:
Experienced AI mastermind who can work with an experienced developer, with many projects to manage across a broad spectrum of user cases, is needed.




At the end of this consultancy the developer/student should have excellent command of the basic approaches to AI coding and generative requirements.

He'd able to operate independently, teach, and present AI derived code to other responsible parties for them to check (and develop further) in order to accelerate their varying efforts on our behalf.




Knowing and teaching which are the right tools for the specific task(s) at hand across this broad-spectrum would be a central tenet of this assignment and skill set we hope to see in this consultant-candidate.




If you're in town that would be great! If not, but willing to travel/stay for a bit, we can talk about making the necessary arrangements.

title: Upgrade Our Current Faith-Based Logo
description:
Communication: Â Â 

Must be willing throughout the logo design process, to patiently discuss project details on an audio platform or by telephone in English several times, rather than only via chat messaging. Â Audio communication works best for us!




Scope of Work: Â Â 

We have a logo already of which we need you to give advice and upgrade with design additions that make it awesome! Â We have the .ai working file, yet the logo needs your energy and enthusiasm to make it come alive and be itsâ€™ very best! Â Also, we need 2 versions of the upgraded logo, one version with the ownerâ€™s photograph in it, and the other version without the photo.Â 

Â 

The Logoâ€™s Look: Â 

The final logo should look exciting, draw attention, and stand out among competition! Â Also, it needs to be upgraded into a shiny powerful dimensional design that is unforgettable. Â Think light rays, sparks, glow, and special lighting effects! Â Also, make into 3D! 3D! 3D!




Faith Family Entertainment Products: Â 

The brilliant lifelong logo variations you upgrade will be featured in faith-based animated shorts, books, paper print products, t-shirts, and other consumer products geared toward inspiring faith in children, families and everyone!Â 

Â 

Revisions and Your Patience: Â Â 

We are looking for perfection of the logo designs, so we require much patience and understanding with multiple revisions and corrections that we ask you for. Â Energetic and enthusiastic!




Please submit the following: Â Â 

Write us about how your talents and interests benefit this fun and lively project, we want to hear from you - this is important in selection! Â Also, attach your logo portfolio link or attach several samples of your upbeat, fun and colorful logo designs. Â We look forward in your message and attachments.




Amount of Logo Design Variations: Â 

In your message, please indicate how many logo variation designs you are willing to create for the one with the owner's photograph and without it. Â You may also animate the new upgraded logo if desired. Â That is a plus!




Copyright and Ownership: Â 

Must be willing to review and sign an NDA, copyright and ownership agreement before work begins.




Thank you for your consideration of our bid.

title: Need Design of 20 Faith-Based Characters
description:
Communication: Â 

Must be willing throughout the design process, to patiently discuss project details on Guruâ€™s audio platform or by phone in English several times, rather than only via chat messaging. Â Audio communication is best for us.

Â 

General Scope of Work: Â Â 

According to the personalities of 20 faith-based characters that we have already have, you will design each character's physical appearance accordingly. Â In summary, with your artistry ability and with AI, youâ€™ll design a family of 20 characters with a variety of very lively facial expressions.Â

Detailed Job Description: Â 

You will base the charactersâ€™ physical features and clothing outfits utilizing the illustrations that we already have, that were designed mostly by traditional illustration. Â You will take our current traditional illustrations, and with the help of AI along with your own design abilities - youâ€™ll further improve, upgrade and finalize the charactersâ€™ bodily features, clothing, etc. Â Youâ€™ll finalize all 20 characters, so they all fit together into an amazing character family. In addition, youâ€™ll use AI to make them appear in 3D dimension. Thirteen characters ages range from 7 to 16 years old male and female, approx. 3 adult characters, 4 unique creature characters. Â Â 

Â

These brilliant lifelong characters you design will be featured in faith-based animated shorts, books, paper print products, t-shirts, and other consumer products geared toward inspiring faith in children, families and everyone!Â

Â 

Please submit the following: Â Â

Â Also, attach your character portfolio link or attach several samples of your upbeat, fun and colorful character designs in AI with your own artistic creativity. Â  Especially attach African American characters you have designed. Â Please note that our charactersâ€™ ethnicities are diverse. Â Â 

Copyright and Ownership: Â Must be willing to review and sign an NDA, copyright and ownership agreement before work begins.Â 




Bid Amount:

You may bid up to $990 USD

Â 

Thank you for your consideration of our bid. Â We look forward in your message to us and character attachments!

title: AI-based email response
description:
Need a private DeepSeek LLM model fine tuned with company products to reply to emails received requesting product information with the requested information. Needs super simple webpage to manage (email server settings) and keep history (from/to/subject/reply content). . Install everything on one AWS EC2 instance. Use MySQL for database. Needs to connect to email server, get new emails, respond to them and send replies using company SMTP server. Webpage needs to manage how often emails are checked and replied.




Focus should be on simple design and simple deployment.

title: AI Sales Integration for NRCIA.org
description:
Project overview




Develop an AI sales agent to manage leads from all social media, integrated with HubSpot, Manychat, and VoiceFlow.

Requirements




- AI development for lead handling from social media platforms - Integration with HubSpot CRM for lead management - Integration with Manychat for automated communication - Integration for VoiceFlow to handle outbound and inbound voice calls

title: MVP: AI-enabled, Multi-Tenant Platform
description:
This project is already in progress.Â 




We are using AzureÂ 




What we have so farÂ 




Completed UIÂ 

ELT PipelineÂ 

Azure Blob StorageÂ 

SQL DBÂ 

Auth0 IntegrationÂ 

ChatGPT IntegrationÂ 




Project: Revfinity OS â€“ Multi-Tenant AI Enablement System (MVP)Â 




Overview:Â 




Weâ€™re building a lightweight, AI-enabled RevOps platform designed for multi-tenant environments, with seamless Auth0 authentication, event-driven ticketing, and real-time user interaction.Â 




The system supports role-based actions, task tracking, report building, and Apollo call analysis.Â 




Workstreams:Â 




1. Multi-Tenant Auth0 Integration Implement tenant-aware user creation and assign unique tenant_id per company. Support role-based access: Admin, Manager, Rep. Store tenant/role claims in Auth0 app_metadata and JWT custom claims. Extend Auth0 Actions to enrich tokens. Create secure middleware to block cross-tenant access. Unit tests for RBAC, JWT validation, and permission escalation attempts.Â 




2. Event-Driven Ticketing System (Azure Functions) Azure Functions to detect: CRM/LMS gaps Low-performing calls Auto-generate Enablement Tickets (with tenant_id, owner_id, recommended_action, etc.). Support scheduled or manual triggers. Log ticket actions and ensure lifecycle status changes (Created, Assigned, Completed). Optimize for <500ms execution time and batch limits per tenant.Â 




3. Internal Writeback APIs (Tasks & Training) REST APIs for: POST /tickets/complete POST /trainings/create POST /tasks/complete Validate tenant and role permissions. Maintain audit logs and idempotent operations. Return consistent and secure responses.Â 




4. AI Console Feature Completion Real-time task/ticket delivery (SignalR, WebSockets, or polling). UI notifications for new items by role. LMS and Planner writeback integration. Report Builder with: AI summaries Chart/table previews Save + store metadata File upload module: Parse CSV/XLSX/TXT Inject summary into AI prompt Max size 5MB, type restrictions, malware scanÂ 




5. ChatGPT Role-Based NLP Enhancements Inject dynamic instructions based on user role (AE, CRO, RevOps, etc.). Summarize uploaded files to enrich AI prompt. Respect token limits and fail gracefully. Log context and role injection per prompt.Â 




Deliverables Summary: Tenant-based Auth0 setup with enriched tokens Secure route-based access controls Azure Functions for pattern detection and ticket creation Full enablement ticket lifecycle management RESTful APIs for writebacks across tasks/trainings/tickets Real-time updates in AI Console AI-powered Report Builder with LMS/CRM context Dynamic NLP behavior based on user role and uploaded data Tech Stack: Auth0 (Actions, RBAC) Node.js or Python (Azure Functions) FastAPI or Express (Internal APIs) PostgreSQL / Supabase (Tenant-aware DB) SignalR or WebSockets ChatGPT API Apollo, LMS API integration Testing Requirements: Unit & integration tests for API, middleware, and Auth0 claims Permission escalation, cross-tenant isolation, token tampering scenarios Real-time function latency and throughput under loadÂ 




Timeline: 4â€“6 weeks (MVP-ready)Â 




Ideal Freelancer: Proven experience with multi-tenant SaaS architecture Deep familiarity with Auth0, JWT, and RBAC Prior work with Azure Functions is a must, the entirety of this project is in Azure. Strong in API development and security, data engineering, and ChatGPT prompt engineeringÂ 




Bonus: Background in RevOps, sales tech, or enablement systems

title: AI Voice Agent Developer for Outbound

Trigger calls based on lead lists.
